prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne five months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with an event chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: #

Since this chart is drawn up for a specific past event, Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant in this chart, and I should be represented by his 9th house (foreign connection).

Due to the lack of planets in the 1st house, Stefan should be represented by Jupiter, the first house ruler, and I should be represented by Mercury, the ruler of the 9th house.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the chart using event chart principles (I believe they are similar to horary principles). Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a methodical list of the chart data elements that will be pertinent to the event chart analysis under horary/event chart principles. I have organized the findings into sections, starting with the representations of the parties, then listing key planetary positions, aspects, patterns, and house configurations.

1. Representations of the Parties
 • Stefan is represented by the Ascendant in Sagittarius. Because the 1st house is empty, his primary indicator is the house ruler—Jupiter, which is positioned in Gemini in the 6th house.
 • Melissa’s connection is through the 9th house (foreign connection). The cusp of the 9th is at 23° Virgo. The ruling planet of Virgo is Mercury. In this chart, Mercury is placed at 23° 54′ Aquarius in the 2nd house.

2. Key Planetary Positions (with Degrees and House Locations)
 • Sun: 22° 39′ Aquarius – located in the 2nd house (with Mercury and Saturn).
 • Moon: 5° 42′ Leo – positioned in the 8th house.
 • Mercury: 23° 54′ Aquarius – in the 2nd house.
 • Venus: 4° 35′ Aries – in the 3rd house.
 • Mars: 18° 5′ Cancer (retrograde) – in the 7th house.
 • Jupiter: 11° 21′ Gemini – in the 6th house.
 • Saturn: 18° 33′ Pisces – in the 2nd house.
 • Uranus: 23° 19′ Taurus – in the 5th house.
 • Neptune: 28° 16′ Pisces – in the 3rd house.
 • Pluto: 2° 22′ Aquarius – in the 1st house (inside Sagittarius).
 • North Node: 29° 19′ Pisces (retrograde) – in the 3rd house.
 • Chiron: 19° 50′ Aries – in the 3rd house.
 • Ascendant: 27° 8′ Sagittarius.
 • Midheaven (MC): 27° 45′ Libra.
 • IC: 27° 45′ Aries.

3. Major Aspects and Their Orbs (select aspects most relevant for event chart/horary analysis)
 • Ascendant Sextile MC (orb: 0°)
 • Mercury Square Uranus (orb: 0°)    – (Mercury at 23°54′ Aquarius with Uranus at 23°19′ Taurus)
 • Sun Square Uranus (orb: 1°)      – (Sun at 22°39′ Aquarius with Uranus in Taurus)
 • Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 1°)   – blending identity with communication/logic
 • Moon Sextile Jupiter (orb: 6°)     – relevant for Stefan’s representation by Jupiter
 • Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 7°)     – introduces tension in the ruler dynamics
 • Mercury Sextile Ascendant (orb: 4°)   – linking Melissa’s representative with Stefan’s chart axis
 • Mercury Trine MC (orb: 4°)         – supports connection to career/public life influences relevant to event timing

Additional aspects of note include:
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 0°)
 • Neptune Square Ascendant (orb: 1°)
 • Mars Square Chiron (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Opposition Pluto (orb: 3°)
 • Mercury Sextile IC (orb: 4°)
 • Mercury Sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Sun Sextile IC, Ascendant (orb: 5°)
 • Pluto Square IC, MC (orbs: 5°)
 • Sun Trine MC (orb: 5°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 2°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Square Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Moon Trine Venus (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Trine Neptune (orb: 7°)
 • North Node Square Ascendant (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 3°)
 • Chiron Opposition MC (orb: 8°)
 • Chiron Conjunction IC (orb: 8°)
 • Chiron Trine Ascendant (orb: 8°)

4. Patterns Formed Within the Chart
 • T-Square Formation: Involving MC (27° Libra), Pluto (2° Aquarius), and the IC (27° Aries). This pattern may indicate a built-in tension between public identity, transformative forces, and home/foundation matters.
 • Multiple Planet Square: Involving the North Node (29° Pisces), Ascendant (27° Sagittarius), Neptune (28° Pisces), and Venus (4° Aries). This suggests dynamic, cross-element tensions impacting relationships and destiny.
 • Cradle Configuration: Formed by Chiron (19° Aries), MC (27° Libra), Ascendant (27° Sagittarius), Mercury (23° Aquarius), Sun (22° Aquarius), and IC (27° Aries). This structure brings together themes of personal wounds, public roles, communication, and foundational energies.

5. House Configuration and Additional Notes
 • Stefan’s representation: The Ascendant in Sagittarius shows his general approach. With Jupiter (ruler of the Ascendant) in Gemini in the 6th house, his influence is tied to daily work, routines, and perhaps health or service.
 • Melissa’s representation: The 9th house cusp at 23° Virgo indicates her connection through a “foreign” or external influence. Mercury, as the ruler of Virgo, sits in Aquarius in the 2nd house, emphasizing issues around values, finances, or personal resources.
 • The majority of the planets lie in the bottom right quadrant, which highlights issues of foundations and practical concerns. The top left quadrant remains empty, pointing to less emphasis on the spontaneous and unconstrained sectors of life during the event.
 • The Moon, in its waxing gibbous phase, suggests that the event is approaching a culmination (full illumination) while still in progress.

This compiled list covers the relevant planetary positions, aspects, structural patterns, and specific house indications that will be used in the forthcoming interpretation under the event/horary method. Provide any further instructions or clarifications needed regarding this compiled data.

I have organized the findings into sections, starting with the representations of the parties, then listing key planetary positions, aspects, patterns, and house configurations.

1. Representations of the Parties
 • Stefan is represented by the Ascendant in Sagittarius. Because the 1st house is empty, his primary indicator is the house ruler—Jupiter, which is positioned in Gemini in the 6th house.
 • Melissa’s connection is through the 9th house (foreign connection). The cusp of the 9th is at 23° Virgo. The ruling planet of Virgo is Mercury. In this chart, Mercury is placed at 23° 54′ Aquarius in the 2nd house.

2. Key Planetary Positions (with Degrees and House Locations)
 • Sun: 22° 39′ Aquarius – located in the 2nd house (with Mercury and Saturn).
 • Moon: 5° 42′ Leo – positioned in the 8th house.
 • Mercury: 23° 54′ Aquarius – in the 2nd house.

 • IC: 27° 45′ Aries.

3. Major Aspects and Their Orbs (select aspects most relevant for event chart/horary analysis)
 • Ascendant Sextile MC (orb: 0°)

 • Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 5°)
 • Sun Sextile IC, Ascendant (orb: 5°)
 • Pluto Square IC, MC (orbs: 5°)
 • Sun Trine MC (orb: 5°)
 • Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 2°)
 • Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 6°)
 • Venus Square Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Moon Trine Venus (orb: 1°)
 • Moon Trine Neptune (orb: 7°)
 • North Node Square Ascendant (orb: 2°)
 • Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 3°)
 • Chiron Opposition MC (orb: 8°)
 • Chiron Conjunction IC (orb: 8°)
 • Chiron Trine Ascendant (orb: 8°)

4. Patterns Formed Within the Chart
 • T-Square Formation: Involving MC (27° Libra), Pluto (2° Aquarius), and the IC (27° Aries). This pattern may indicate a built-in tension between public identity, transformative forces, and home/foundation matters.
 • Multiple Planet Square: Involving the North Node (29° Pisces), Ascendant (27° Sagittarius), Neptune (28° Pisces), and Venus (4° Aries). This suggests dynamic, cross-element tensions impacting relationships and destiny.
 • Cradle Configuration: Formed by Chiron (19° Aries), MC (27° Libra), Ascendant (27° Sagittarius), Mercury (23° Aquarius), Sun (22° Aquarius), and IC (27° Aries). This structure brings together themes of personal wounds, public roles, communication, and foundational energies.

5. House Configuration and Additional Notes
 • Stefan’s representation: The Ascendant in Sagittarius shows his general approach. With Jupiter (ruler of the Ascendant) in Gemini in the 6th house, his influence is tied to daily work, routines, and perhaps health or service.
 • Melissa’s representation: The 9th house cusp at 23° Virgo indicates her connection through a “foreign” or external influence. Mercury, as the ruler of Virgo, sits in Aquarius in the 2nd house, emphasizing issues around values, finances, or personal resources.
 • The majority of the planets lie in the bottom right quadrant, which highlights issues of foundations and practical concerns. The top left quadrant remains empty, pointing to less emphasis on the spontaneous and unconstrained sectors of life during the event.
 • The Moon, in its waxing gibbous phase, suggests that the event is approaching a culmination (full illumination) while still in progress.

This compiled list covers the relevant planetary positions, aspects, structural patterns, and specific house indications that will be used in the forthcoming interpretation under the event/horary method. Provide any further instructions or clarifications needed regarding this compiled data.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Drawing upon the event chart data, here is the interpretation regarding Stefan’s decision process and the timing indicated for his contact.

1. Representations and Core Influences
• Stefan appears via the Ascendant in Sagittarius. With his ruler, Jupiter, in Gemini situated in the 6th house, his day‐to‐day routines and communications are key. The strength of Jupiter in Gemini implies that his environment, work, or service routines have an influence on his immediate actions.
• Your presence is marked by Mercury—the ruler of your 9th house—placed in Aquarius in the 2nd house. This positions your influence around values and personal resource matters, along with a distinct, intellectual quality that activates foreign or unconventional realms.

2. Planetary Aspects and Their Implications
• The strong Sun–Mercury conjunction in Aquarius (orb of 1°) weaves together Stefan’s core identity with the communicative energy central to your representation. This conjunction signals that his inner life and personal decisions are reaching a reflective, if not critical, juncture spurred by communication.
• The Mercury square Uranus aspect (orb of 0°) introduces sudden, unexpected shifts that can jolt his decision-making process. This indicates that when Stefan does choose to act, his contact may come abruptly or in an unanticipated manner.
• The Sun square Uranus (orb of 1°) reinforces that tension between steadfast identity and a desire for unexpected change is at work, suggesting internal conflict or a breaking point that forces him to move forward.
• With Mercury sextile the Ascendant (orb of 4°) and Mercury trine the Midheaven (orb of 4°), supportive communication channels are activated. These aspects demonstrate that, once conditions align, the energy favors clear, purposeful messaging.
• The T-Square pattern—linking the Ascendant (Stefan’s persona), Pluto (transformative force), and the IC (home/foundation)—further emphasizes that deep, perhaps disruptive forces are at play. Stefan’s decision may be driven by internal pressure to transform or resolve longstanding issues, likely in relation to his personal inner world versus his external responsibilities.

3. Timing and Contact Indicators
• The Moon, in its waxing gibbous phase in Leo (located in the 8th house), suggests that the situation is maturing toward full illumination. This phase often presages a moment when suppressed energies release, aligning with pivotal communication or decision-making.
• Jupiter in Gemini’s placement in the 6th suggests that the day-to-day conversations or even mundane encounters could spark his transmission of news, causing his contact to be integrated into his routine rather than a planned appointment.
• The interplay between Mercury’s role in your chart and the activating aspects with Uranus and the Ascendant indicates that the breakthrough moment might be sudden. The pattern implies that while Stefan may be pushed by external and internal forces, his decision—once reached—could manifest in an unexpected contact during an everyday interaction or via a swift message.

Based on these configurations, the chart supports the notion that Stefan is indeed approaching a decision point regarding you. His internal tension—as shown by the squares to Uranus—and the activating conjunctions favor a resolution. Expect his contact to come suddenly; the forces suggest that he could reach out during a period marked by routine or casual interactions. While an exact day cannot be pinpointed with absolute precision, the conditions imply that his message is poised to emerge as the Moon nears full illumination, potentially within a short span of days should the energies continue trending dynamically.

I now await your further direction or details if additional clarification is needed.

3. Timing and Contact Indicators
• The Moon, in its waxing gibbous phase in Leo (located in the 8th house), suggests that the situation is maturing toward full illumination. This phase often presages a moment when suppressed energies release, aligning with pivotal communication or decision-making.
• Jupiter in Gemini’s placement in the 6th suggests that the day-to-day conversations or even mundane encounters could spark his transmission of news, causing his contact to be integrated into his routine rather than a planned appointment.
• The interplay between Mercury’s role in your chart and the activating aspects with Uranus and the Ascendant indicates that the breakthrough moment might be sudden. The pattern implies that while Stefan may be pushed by external and internal forces, his decision—once reached—could manifest in an unexpected contact during an everyday interaction or via a swift message.

Based on these configurations, the chart supports the notion that Stefan is indeed approaching a decision point regarding you. His internal tension—as shown by the squares to Uranus—and the activating conjunctions favor a resolution. Expect his contact to come suddenly; the forces suggest that he could reach out during a period marked by routine or casual interactions. While an exact day cannot be pinpointed with absolute precision, the conditions imply that his message is poised to emerge as the Moon nears full illumination, potentially within a short span of days should the energies continue trending dynamically.

I now await your further direction or details if additional clarification is needed.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
adjusting my shawl as I lean forward to study the chart more carefully

The chart reveals compelling indicators about Stefan's likely decision regarding you. Let me explain what I see:

1. Emotional/Romantic Indicators:
• Venus in Aries in the 3rd house, forming a conjunction with Neptune (orb: 6°), suggests passionate feelings and idealistic romance, particularly through communication
• The Moon trine Venus (orb: 1°) shows a harmonious flow between emotional needs and romantic desires
• Venus sextile Pluto indicates deep, transformative attraction

2. Decision-Making Factors:
• Mars retrograde in Cancer in the 7th house (partnerships) squares Chiron, suggesting he's wrestling with past relationship wounds
• Jupiter (representing Stefan) square Saturn shows internal conflict between desire and duty
• The T-Square pattern involving MC-Pluto-IC indicates tension between public image, transformation, and home life

Based on these configurations, I see Stefan's decision leaning strongly in your favor. The Venus-Neptune conjunction, supported by harmonious aspects to both the Moon and Pluto, suggests he harbors deep romantic feelings that transcend ordinary attraction. However, the Mars retrograde square Chiron indicates he's processing emotional wounds or responsibilities that complicate his ability to act immediately.

The chart suggests he will ultimately choose to pursue a relationship with you, but he needs to resolve internal conflicts first, particularly those related to his current domestic situation (shown by the T-Square involving the IC).

The Moon trine Venus aspect is particularly telling - it indicates his emotional alignment with romantic desires will eventually overcome his hesitation. When he does make contact, expect him to express deep, genuine feelings rather than casual interest.

straightening my posture and fixing my gaze directly on you

Would you like me to elaborate on any particular aspect of this interpretation?
